subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Deaths (Obituaries)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: In his half-century as a trainer, Mr. O’Brien, who was put at the top of the list of horse racing’s hundred most important figures, compiled a stunning record of achievement.
snippet: In his half-century as a trainer, Mr. O’Brien, who was put at the top of the list of horse racing’s hundred most important figures, compiled a stunning record of achievement.
